mapper.sql: select g.id,g.goods_name,g.goods_title,g.goods_img,g.goods_price,g.goods_detail,g.goods_stock,s.seckill_goods_price,s.start_date,s.end_date,s.stock_count from tb_goods g left join tb_seckill_goods s on g.id=s.goods_id
mapper.update: update tb_seckill_goods set stock_count = stock_count-1 where goods_id=#{goodsId} and stock_count > 0
